title: The Week in pictures. Issue no. 297
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Premiere of film “Dancing Years” attended by Ava Gardner, Dennis Price, Michael Rennie, Richard Attenborough and other. Schoolboy designs fashion clothes. Man puts thatched roof on a car.
